questions.question: We know for sure that the temperature is going to increase next year.

choices.answer: It might increase next year.
It couldn't increase next year.
It will increase next year.
It may not increase next year.

questions.question: It is impossible for the Earth to be covered in water.

choices.answer: The Earth may not be covered in water.
The Earth could not be covered in water.
The Earth might be covered in water.
The Earth won't be covered in water.

questions.question: The government promised not to sign the Kyoto Agreement in the future.

choices.answer: The government couldn't sign it in the future.
The government may sign it in the future.
The government will not sign it in the future.
The government might sign it in the future.

questions.question: For Siberia, climate change could be good or bad. We don't know.

choices.answer: Climate change couldn't be good for Siberia.
Climate change will be good for Siberia.
Climate change won't be good for Siberia.
Climate change may be good for Siberia.

questions.question: There is a conference on global warming, but I don't know if I can attend.

choices.answer: I might not attend the conference.
I will attend the conference.
I couldn't attend the conference.
I will not attend the conference.
